item.description:
What traditional party game can we give a new sexy twist to? Kama Sutra Charades?Truth or Don't you Dare? The Mating Game?  ;)

okay, okay...ill keep working on it....I'm having fun coming up with ideas for fun party games that we can enjoy while getting to know each other. Nothing explicit but lets let our hair down. Let's laugh, let loose and get creative...

Games will be from 7:30 to 9pm. 9pm til Midnight is open social party time! There may be some dancing....but this is more of a conversation and mingle event.

A great way to meet other singles without all the pressure of a traditional dating event. There will be special stickers for singles so you can identify each other....but everyone is welcome....so bring friends for moral & not so moral support! ;)

The event is $20 (be sure to prebuy ticket to make sure you get a spot. With the weather being colder, not as many people can fit in my house!) Appetizers and non-alcoholic beverages will be provided.

You can bring your own wine and beer if you would like.
item.name: The Game of Love - Game Night & Party
